description: Deletes the specified scaling group. This action is irreversible. You cannot delete a scaling group until all the clusters running on it have been deleted.

parameters.name: environmentId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the kdb environment, from where you want to delete the dataview.

parameters.name: scalingGroupName
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the kdb scaling group.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A token that ensures idempotency. This token expires in 10 minutes. This field is autopopulated if not provided.
